in an X works is that when you are doing all the operations in your neuron Network like hey you know we need to we
need to uh multiply those tensors we need to calculate soft Max we need to do
the sum when you're doing all those computations you're actually not doing those computations at the moment what
you're are doing is that you're are building a computation graph with everything that you want to do in that
new network and then they get this computation graph and when you call that function with a particular tensor with
certain dimensions a certain size it emits highly specialized codes for that
particular type of tensor for that particular graph and that's why everything is functional because what
you're doing is building a graph you're not doing any computations and then you compile that to around the GPU when we
